titleStmt.title: The. xi. bookes of the Golden asse conteininge the Metamorphosie of Lucius Apuleius, enterlaced with sondrie pleasaunt and delectable tales, with an excellent narration of the mariage of Cupide and Psiches, set out in the. iiii. v. and vj. bookes. Translated out of Latine into Englishe by VVilliam Adlington.
Metamorphoses. English
titleStmt.author: Apuleius.
Adlington, William, fl. 1566.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fleetstreate, at the signe of the Oliphante, by Henry VVykes,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
